divs: Sighting DetailsAs turned onto W. branch rd. my father said whats that. When i looked up i seen a long line of red orange lights in a strait line. We drove down and parked in the middle of the yard. Watched these lights as they passed over there was no sound as they moved away they would vanish. I thought i noticed them rotating hard to tell. 40 to 60 objects.
Summary: 40 to 60 red orange orb like lights traveling to the southwest over Oxford pa.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Oxford
There was one other sighting in Oxford on or around September 28th 2013
